mapper.select: SELECT P.* FROM PRODUCT P, (SELECT SUM(AMOUNT) SUM, PRODUCT_NO FROM ORDER_DETAIL GROUP BY PRODUCT_NO) D WHERE P.PRODUCT_NO = D.PRODUCT_NO AND ROWNUM <= 9 ORDER BY D.SUM DESC
SELECT O.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM R_NUM, R.* FROM (SELECT * FROM REVIEW WHERE PRODUCT_NO = 1 ORDER BY REVIEW_NO DESC) R ) O WHERE R_NUM BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART (CART_NO, OPTION_NO, USER_ID, QTY, PRICE) VALUES (CART_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{optionNo}, #{userId}, #{qty}, #{price})
INSERT INTO LIKE_PRODUCT (LIKE_NO, PRODUCT_NO, USER_ID, LDATE) VALUES (LIKE_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{productNo}, #{userId}, SYSDATE)
